mean_cn: n. 先驱；祖先；前兆；预兆
mean_en: a person or thing that came before and influenced somebody/something else that is similar; a sign of what is going to happen
sentence: Do you agree that he is the forerunner of Chinese rock music?
sentence_trans: 你同意他是中国摇滚乐先驱这种说法吗？
word_etyma: fore前 + run跑步 + ner人 → 先跑出去的人 → forerunner先驱，先导
